title: Cafe Schlack
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Organic, European, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A family-run business since 1813. A small cafeteria with a sweet shabby chic style. Serves regional and made-in-house homemade style food. Vegan items include cakes, soymilk, frozen yogurt, soups and lunch. Has a breakfast buffet with some vegan choices. Available for guests of the hotel and non-guests.
